## FlagStore

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/flags/store.ts" sourceLine="8" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents a store for feature flags.
This store extends the Collection class to manage feature flags by their keys.

```ts title="Signature"
class FlagStore extends Collection<string, FeatureFlag<any, any>> {

}
```
* Extends: <code>Collection&#60;string, <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/classes/feature-flag#featureflag'>FeatureFlag</a>&#60;any, any&#62;&#62;</code>
